channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 67

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Though I can usually recreate most of the game from memory (if we play slower time settings), I made it a habit to record games on my iPad as I played since I wanted to capture the games as accurately as possible for the blog. How about you?
item.content:encoded: Though I can usually recreate most of the game from memory (if we play slower time settings), I made it a habit to record games on my iPad as I played since I wanted to capture the games as accurately as possible for the blog. How about you?

item.title: By: HeJin
item.dc:creator: HeJin
item.description: How do you record face to face games? Do you remember them by heart?
item.content:encoded: How do you record face to face games? Do you remember them by heart?

item.title: By: HeJin
item.dc:creator: HeJin
item.description: How do you record face to face games? Do you remember them by heart?
item.content:encoded: How do you record face to face games? Do you remember them by heart?

item.title: By: Sundaay
item.dc:creator: Sundaay
item.description: SmartGo Kifu is hands down the best go app for iPad.
item.content:encoded: SmartGo Kifu is hands down the best go app for iPad.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Absolutely! I have no problem with that at all.
item.content:encoded: Absolutely! I have no problem with that at all.

item.title: By: Terri Schurter
item.dc:creator: Terri Schurter
item.description: I am thinking of doing a blog post soon promoting the app Smart Go Kifu. Is it okay with you if I post the jpg of those four moves with a link back to your blog post with the game?
item.content:encoded: I am thinking of doing a blog post soon promoting the app Smart Go Kifu. Is it okay with you if I post the jpg of those four moves with a link back to your blog post with the game?

item.title: By: Terri Schurter
item.dc:creator: Terri Schurter
item.description: I decided to download your sgf file so I could view your game in Smart Go Kifu. I found that since I was viewing the blog on my iPad I was given a choice of the app to use to view the file when I tapped on the link to download. Smart Go Kifu was one of the choices. After I got the file into the app I viewed it in the book view. It was really nice to review that way especially because you comment on every move in the game. I did a screen capture of one of the pages and sent it to you via email.
